nodes.text: The rebel speeder was a model of starship that was active during the war between the First Order and the Resistance and was used by the Mining Guild. Several of these starships joined the citizens' fleet that was assembled by General Lando Calrissian to aid the Resistance against the forces of the Sith Eternal during the Battle of Exegol.

The vessel had a front starboard cockpit for the pilot and a port turret-mounted twin laser cannon towards the aft that was operated by a gunner. It was equipped with two frontal laser cannons, two engines, and a hyperdrive.

The rebel speeder was first seen in Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker and identified as such in the clip, "A Final Alliance" behind the scenes featurette that comes with the Target exclusive of the home video.
